Background:

Read through the chapter on Functional Programming of Hadley Wickhamâ€™s book on Advanced R Programming.

Write a blog post discussing the question:

Regard the code below and describe in what way(s) the idea of functional programming makes code easier to write and maintain.

x <- 1:10
funs <- list(
  sum = sum,
  mean = mean,
  median = median
)
lapply(funs, function(f) f(x, na.rm=TRUE))

Instructions:

Go to https://github.com/Stat585-at-ISU/blog for instructions about how to prepare and submit your blog post.
